General.Name: Rizhao Port Co Ltd
General.Description: Rizhao Port Co.,Ltd provides port services in China. It is involved in the loading and unloading, stockpiling, and transit of bulk cargoes, including metal ore, coal, grain, timber, steel, non-metallic ores, cement, wood chips, soybeans, petroleum coke, logs, and other cargoes. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Rizhao, China.

3.Name: Mr. Chun Sheng  Zhang
3.Title: Head of Audit Department & Employee Supervisor
